law.catch_line: Short title for KRS 154.48-010 to 154.48-035 -- Kentucky Environmental Stewardship Act.
law.text: KRS 154.48-010 to 154.48-035 shall be known as the Kentucky Environmental Stewardship Act.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 148, effective March 18, 2005.

metadata.lrc-note: (3/18/2005). 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 165, provides that this section shall apply to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2005.
